flowRoot.flowPara: This module contains routines for detecting and enhancing the brightness, contrast of images, often caused by unsuitable parameters during image capture

g.ns0:text:
from skimage import data, exposure, io
import numpy as np

img = io.imread('low_contrast.jpeg')
img_restored = exposure.equalize_adapthist(img)
io.imsave('output.png', img_restored)
g.text: from skimage import data, exposure, io

flowRoot.flowPara: feature module contains methods to detect blobs and shapes in images.
